comments:
Description:
Sharing the group will pop up error[00]

Step:
1. New a datasource and dataset
2. New a table named table1 and add a group.
3. New another table and binding the result set from table1
4. Preview

Actual result:
It pop up an exception and said the group name is duplicates.

Error message:
Exception  
The following items have errors: 


ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- The group names are duplicates. 
The group names are duplicates. ( 1 time(s) )
